verbose_text: Among various tumor targeting peptides, bombesin (BBN) analogs are of particular interest because BBN targets gastrin releasing peptide receptor (GRPR), which is overexpressed in a wide spectrum of human tumors, including prostate cancer, breast cancer, small cell lung cancer, ovarian cancers, endometrial cancers, and gastrointestinal stromal tumors XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR.
evidence: gastrin-releasing peptide receptor (GRPR), which is overexpressed
